    "action": "nested",
    "value": {
      "follow": {
        "action": "added",
        "value": false
      },
      "setting1": {
        "action": "unchanged",
        "value": "Value 1"
      },
      "setting2": {
        "action": "deleted",
        "value": 200
      },
      "setting3": {
        "action": "updated",
        "value": {
          "old entry": true,
          "new entry": null
        }
      },
      "setting4": {
        "action": "added",
        "value": "blah blah"
      },
      "setting5": {
        "action": "added",
        "value": {
          "key5": "value5"
        }
      },
      "setting6": {
        "action": "nested",
        "value": {
          "doge": {
            "action": "nested",
            "value": {
              "wow": {
                "action": "updated",
                "value": {
                  "old entry": "",
                  "new entry": "so much"
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "key": {
            "action": "unchanged",
            "value": "value"
          },
          "ops": {
            "action": "added",
            "value": "vops"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "group1": {
    "action": "nested",
    "value": {
      "baz": {
        "action": "updated",
        "value": {
          "old entry": "bas",
          "new entry": "bars"
        }
      },
      "foo": {
        "action": "unchanged",
        "value": "bar"
      },
      "nest": {
        "action": "updated",
        "value": {
          "old entry": {
            "key": "value"
          },
          "new entry": "str"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "group2": {
    "action": "deleted",
    "value": {
      "abc": 12345,
      "deep": {
        "id": 45
      }
    }
  },
  "group3": {
    "action": "added",
    "value": {
      "deep": {
        "id": {

        }
      },
      "fee": 100500
